document.full_text: charlie sheen, whose well-publicized list of bad habits includes smoking, is being offered a hand in kicking the tobacco habit by an ontario cabinet minister, media reports said on thursday.
document.title: canadian politician wants to torpedo charlie sheen's smoking
lines_and_colors: charlie sheen, whose well-publicized list of bad habits includes smoking, is being offered a hand in kicking the tobacco habit by an ontario cabinet minister, media reports said on thursday.
